dcterms:creator: Rong-En Fan
Kai-Wei Chang
Cho-Jui Hsieh

Chih-Jen Lin
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of 60000 training images and 10000 testing images of handwritten digits, each image is in greyscale, 28 by 28 pixels in size, with labels ranging from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Pascal Vincent
Hugo Larochelle
Isabelle Lajoie
Yoshua Bengio
Pierre-Antoine Manzagol
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the MNIST dataset where each image has a random background added, making the classification task more challenging.
dcterms:title: mnist-bg-rand

dcterms:creator: Pascal Vincent
Hugo Larochelle
Isabelle Lajoie
Yoshua Bengio
Pierre-Antoine Manzagol
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the MNIST dataset where each image has a background randomly selected from a set of images, complicating the classification task.
dcterms:title: mnist-bg-img

dcterms:creator: Pascal Vincent
Hugo Larochelle
Isabelle Lajoie
Yoshua Bengio
Pierre-Antoine Manzagol
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the MNIST dataset where each digit image is rotated by a random angle, increasing the difficulty of the classification task.
dcterms:title: mnist-rot
